name: Building Blocks
description: This section is about my favorite building blocks. This list will most likely grow as I find new materials to work with and add any mods that might introduce new blocks. Eventually, I will get around to adding pictures and exmaples to each entry.$(br2)All content of my building guide will be uploaded to my OneNote. $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://1drv.ms/u/s!Atp2GkCazUCzb49PlX2XkJHiyAA)Here's the link
